divs: Sighting Detailsi was hanging with friends when suddenly looked up and saw strage lights in the sky.i scream Ufo at first kidding around,but then my firend is looking at the same lights and it looked like a disc shape object.It was movin pretty fast for a aircraft and it zig-zaged alot .It was in the sky for about 5 mins and dissapperd.alot of aircraft were flying pretty low that night which was unusually because i never see planes really flying my area.It appered about 5 mintues after it disappered.It then again was zig-zagging around the sky and it disappered.i was in shock the whole time because i was amazed of what i was seeing.
Summary: Flashin red and blue lights. Moved in zig zag.
